context: In 2015, Cloudflare was a growing CDN and security startup valued at approximately $1B. Akamai dominated the enterprise CDN market while Cloudflare focused on democratizing performance and security for all websites. The company offered free tier that attracted developers and small businesses. DDoS protection was a key competitive differentiator. The market was shifting toward integrated CDN, WAF, and DDoS mitigation solutions.
